name: unv

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, universe), universe)
-| wss(cun(c0, universe), universe)
-| wss(universe, cun(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, universe), universe)
-| wss(cun(c0, universe), universe)
-| wss(universe, cun(c0, universe))

|- wceq(cun(c0, universe), universe)
-| wss(universe, cun(c0, universe))

comment: The union of a class with the universal class is the universal class. Exercise 4.10(l) of [Mendelson] p. 231. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.)
